items.title: Gary Innerarity

items.content_html:
Solutions Architect

Amplified IT I, II, Sec | CCNA, CCENT, CMNO | MTA | GCP

Welcome to my site. It’s a work in progress. I’m slowly releasing my private documentation library for public use on complex and beginner topics to help those where documentation fell short.

Topics will include Cloud Architecting, DevOps, NetOps, and Systems administration. I may even post a few times about management and navigating challenges as a Director of Technology.

Follow along, G.
